task.summary: The database works The movie titles are displayed in the listview
Select list items and goes to the next activity. displays title, image, rating, and description.
you can change the rating for movies
the only thing you cant do is play a trailer
added my own buttons to control the video playback ps. the UI SUCKS
you can select a image for the new movie trailers
you can select a video for the new movie trailers
made the UI look better added a fast forward and rewind button to the video player
